headline: Masco price target lowered to $77 from $82 at Citi
summary: Citi lowered the firm’s price target on Masco (MAS) to $77 from $82 and keeps a Neutral rating on the shares. Citi updated estimates and top picks as part of a 2025 outlook for the homebuilding and building products group. The firm’s 2025 earnings estimates fell 3% on average, and are now below consensus for most producers. After housing starts, remodeling spend, and cement volumes fell in 2024, Citi expects a “very modest rebound year” in 2025, the analyst tells investors in a research note. Th
